column1: Section:PL-Transportation Asset Inventory, Asset Classes (4 Reqs)

column4: Allow system administrator or other authorized user to define different asset classes.
Store full name of asset class (for example: Pavement).
Store an asset class code that users can utilize in selecting asset classes for reports and other system functions.
Store an authorized asset class owner who must be a valid user as defined in the ERP personnel administration and security  functions.
